title: The Horse of a Different Color feat. Christina Anthony & Lindsay Mendez
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Christina Anthony (Mixed-ish, Key & Peele) and Tony winner Lindsay Mendez (Carousel, All Rise) play a one-of-a-kind horse and rider in this enchanted tale from across the Spanish-speaking world.
